msg_003.name: send_text
msg_003.description: Send text to render on the device screen via BLE UART

attributes.name: current_page
attributes.description: Current page number for multi-page text

attributes.name: total_pages
attributes.description: Total number of pages for multi-page text

attributes.name: text_data
attributes.description: UTF-8 encoded text data to display

msg_006.name: send_text_response
msg_006.description: Response to send_text command indicating success, error, or status

attributes.name: sequence
attributes.description: Echo of the sequence number from the request

attributes.name: additional_data
attributes.description: Optional additional response data or error details

msg_013.name: glasses_removed
msg_013.description: Glasses taken off, not in box notification

msg_014.name: case_lid_open
msg_014.description: Put in case, lid open notification

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: Event data - 08 for case lid open

msg_016.name: case_lid_closed
msg_016.description: Put in case, lid closed notification

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: Event data - 0B for case lid closed

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: Event data - 0F for case battery percent (00~64)

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: Event data - 11 for BLE paired success

msg_020.name: right_touchpad_press_hold_release
msg_020.description: Right TouchPad pressed, held, and released notification

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: Event data - 12 for right touchpad press-hold-release

msg_021.name: left_touchpad_press_hold
msg_021.description: Left TouchPad pressed and held notification

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: Event data - 17 for left touchpad press-hold

msg_022.name: left_touchpad_press_release
msg_022.description: Left TouchPad pressed and released notification

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: Event data - 18 for left touchpad press-release

msg_025.name: translate_transcribe_double_tap
msg_025.description: Double tap either side when set to translate or transcribe notification

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: Event data - 20 for translate/transcribe double tap

msg_033.name: get_device_info
msg_033.description: Get device information including charging status and software versions

msg_034.name: get_mn_s_mac
msg_034.description: Get master and slave MAC addresses

msg_039.name: get_system_status
msg_039.description: Get system status and current running app

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Firmware version information string (net build time, app build time, version, device ID)
